divs: Sighting Detailsi did not see a ufo but i have seen two beings on the side of my bed.one was taller than the other one they both had big heads.it was dark in the room but i was still able to see an outline.the shorter one had a pen like flashlight it was was floating in front of it a if they were controlling it.it seemed as if it was tryin to get my attention.something inside of me wasnt afraid so i reached out to the light an the taller one reached out of the dark to place its hand on my wrist.its hands were like human but it was grey and it answered my thoughts in my head {telepathy)it was a mans voice.it then released my hand.both stayed there for second then the pen light were gone.I BELIEVE THEY ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR MY STRANGE GIFT OF ASTRAL PROJECTING AND OTHER THINGS BSINCE I WAS SMALL.WHO ARE THEY?I KNOW FOR A FACT WE ARE NOT ALONE .I HAVE VISITED OTHER PLANETS NOT IN OUR SOLAR SYSTEM.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Quitman
This sighting has never been favorited.
